慥字的基本解释

慥
zào
〔慥慥〕忠厚诚实的样子。
仓猝，急忙：“越王慥然避位”。

慥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zào］
［《廣韻》七到切，去号，清。］
(1)仓猝，急忙。
(2)笃诚貌。参见“慥慥”。

慥字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　慥； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页399第16
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?七到切，音造。慥慥，篤實貌。【中庸】君子胡不慥慥爾。

慥字的起名意思

忠厚诚实的样子。

unfeigned
Basic explanation of words
unfeigned
zào
[慥慥] Faithful and honest.
Hastily and hurriedly: "The King of Yue retired."
unfeigned
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zào］
["Guangyun" Qi to cut, go to the number, clear. ]
(1) Hastily and in a hurry.
(2) Sincere appearance. See "慥慥".
unfeigned
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　慥; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 399-16
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Seven to cut, sound made.慥慥, true appearance. 【The Doctrine of the Mean】The gentleman Hu Buxiuer.
unfeigned
